alert.note: Alert for Dawson; McCone; Richland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:53PM MDT until July 18 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central McCone County in northeastern Montana... Northern Dawson County in northeastern Montana... Central Richland County in northeastern Montana... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 453 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles west of Richey, or 18 miles northeast of Circle, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Fairview, Richey, Lambert, Savage, East Fairview, Enid, Midway, Wooley, Burns and Crane. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
